nodes.text: Yura Telamarch was a male Bezim who became the ruler of his homeworld. He was in an alliance (resulting in the creation of the Mid Rim gateway, Station 88 Spaceport) with Lorian Nod of Junction V, Samish Kash of Delaluna, and Glimmer Uziel of Vicondor.
Telamarch was a tall humanoid with a domed head and a grave manner.
